answers.answer: I like Athletics.I run three times a week in my club.My club is Seraing Athletics.But I have 2 or 3 other hobbies as video games and I play oudside with my friends.I really really like video games.I have a xbox 360 for play whith my games.And the last one is in summer I go to my city for play with my friends and speak the school,jobs,hobbies...
